root.name: Tyrian 2000
root.description: Digital DistributionTyrian 2000 was re-released by Good Old Games with compatibility support for Windows XP, Vista, and 7 for both 32 and 64-bit. It was given away initially as a free gift for Holiday 2010. This despite the game being freely available and open-source online at http://code.google.com/p/opentyrian/. It is good however that the game has been re-released via an "official" channel, allowing many who would otherwise not know of its existence to experience what is regarded as a great old-school shooter by many.

similar_games.game: Jamestown: Legend of the Lost Colony
